content.text:
[@Verinaut-01](@nj2Jn+MbEwGxJXYKlr6ZsQs4TuAaXdUXScIziecH0Rc=.ed25519) 

There are licenses like that -- you might like the [PPL](https://wiki.p2pfoundation.net/Peer_Production_License) and [License Zero](https://licensezero.com/). Both are solid, and there are a handful of discussions about both around SSB.

My personal feelings: I'm [conflicted about copyright](%PwgA1DZgBNDmgWMFaQ0JThmvhgXiWHzrWvA43txtHxI=.sha256), and I'm very hesitant to add the US legal system as an upstream dependency.
